## Summary Statistics

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, out.width='100%'}
p1 <- percent_treemap(risk, RISKCATEGORY, "Risk Categories")

p3 <- percent_treemap(risk, RISK_STRATEGY, "Risk Strategy")

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow = 2, ncol = 2)
```
